item.title: Words and sentences: Kareebergen Stuurmansfontein dialect
item.summary: Words in the dialect of Stuurmansfontein, in the Kareebergen. (B XXIV. 2261; L II.-35. 3160-3164.)
item.comments: 1) See also A few words and names obtained from two Bushmen from Stuurman's and Thier Fontein, 2) This story is found in Book XXIV
item.author: Blaitje Snell
Daoud Moos
